text: We are excited to keep our Artist Of The Month series going by honoring a legendary song writer and multi-instrumentalist, Daron Malakian & Scars On Broadway! Widely known for his mastery song writing with System Of A Down, Malakian's brand of catchy meets quirky extended past his counterparts with the release of his first solo endeavor in 2008, and we've never been the same! Daron Malakian & Scars On Broadway are back again with their first release in 7 years, titled Addicted To The Violence this July, and we couldn't be more excited to dive into this release to learn about the message, the artist, and how it all comes together. Join us as we celebrate Daron Malakian & Scars On Broadway all month long, with a slew of exclusive content and editorials, only at Metal Injection! Want More Metal? html:
We are excited to keep our Artist Of The Month series going by honoring a legendary song writer and multi-instrumentalist, Daron Malakian & Scars On Broadway!

Widely known for his mastery song writing with System Of A Down, Malakian's brand of catchy meets quirky extended past his counterparts with the release of his first solo endeavor in 2008, and we've never been the same!

Daron Malakian & Scars On Broadway are back again with their first release in 7 years, titled Addicted To The Violence this July, and we couldn't be more excited to dive into this release to learn about the message, the artist, and how it all comes together.

Join us as we celebrate Daron Malakian & Scars On Broadway all month long, with a slew of exclusive content and editorials, only at Metal Injection!
